Christina Aguilera could not help but wonder how she got into this bizarre store. She had heard about an out of the way store that she would like, but she didn't expect to see anything this freaky. It looked as if an adult store merged with a voodoo shop with a hint of Avon.
Once she got over the initial creepiness, she started to peruse the store and found that it wasn't half bad. There were toys and lotions that looked and seemed enticing. There was, however, one tub of lotion that caught her eye. It had no label and was about trial sized, but the smell and texture seemed alluring to her.
"Excuse me," she said to the man at the counter. "What is this lotion?"
"I don't know," he said. "I just found it one day and decided to sell it."
"Sold," Christina said.
Later that night, she was at home and getting ready to turn in. She looked at that thing of lotion and decided to try it. She decided to rub it on her face.
